scripts.start: npm run build && npm run copy && npm run node:start
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run copy && npm run node:dev
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.copy: npm run create:frontend-folder && npm run copy:html && npm run copy:css && npm run copy:js
scripts.copy:html: cp frontend/index.html backend/static/frontend/ && cp frontend/gallery.html backend/static/frontend/
